Subject: Excess Property
Gentlemen, We have requirement for ono Truck Fuel Servicing, Catalog 68], Page 5, Control No. 9-82-50719(28), Item 1, Condition E-l. Plomme advise availability. If your reply is in the affirmative we will immediately forward pur purchase order.
Sincerely yours,
a. T. Potter Supply Advisor
